announcement.info: This semester, we will be meeting entirely online! Check your emails for Zoom links and more info.
The final is in 2 weeks. Check <a href="https://piazza.com/class/kbesvacrkom2of?cid=2167">Piazza for more info.</>
If you need an alternate time for the final exam, please <a href="https://piazza.com/class/kbesvacrkom2of?cid=2167">see this Piazza link.</>
Next Wednesday will be our final discussion.
